original_title: Man Made: The Story of Two Men and a Baby
overview: A documentary of a gay couple's determination to be parents despite considerable legal and cultural limitations. Prevented from adopting a child, or accessing IVF facilities or commercial surrogacy in Australia, Tony Wood and Lee Matthews embarked on an international surrogacy arrangement that takes them to Iowa for the birth of their son.
title: Man Made: The Story of Two Men and a Baby
